cleaned_text: About LifeSpan Medicine LifeSpan Medicine is a preventive and longevity focused, functional medicine practice. We provide a variety of healthcare services from our renowned Platinum Program, [Comprehensive Program](https://www.lifespanmedicine.com/concierge), integrative nutrition, joint care and sports medicine. We believe in a proactive, health based approach using top technologies, leading edge diagnostics and integrative, natural therapies to help you look, feel and be your best self. Our experience, understanding and dedication to this approach helps us succeed where other physicians often fail. At LifeSpan Medicine, we provide the best experience and top care for anyone who is focused on vitality and longevity; which can include the end of chronic pain, cancer recovery, non-invasive treatment for athletic enhancement, joint pain and joint care, microbiome and gut health, brain health, cardiovascular health, anti-aging, hormone replacement or eating to reduce inflammation and so much more. Our [caring team of providers](https://www.lifespanmedicine.com/our-team) are comprehensively trained, board certified and experts in their fields. We spend time assessing you and your health before creating customized plans to identify the root cause of each health issue. Our programs correct imbalances, eliminate symptoms, prevent disease and optimize health. With each program we provide expert care, effective treatments, exceptional care coordination and world class support. Dr. Renna, the founder and visionary of LifeSpan Medicine, and his team have clients who travel from all over the world to reach optimal health through our practice. We educate and empower those who strive to improve through integrative medicine and we hand pick the best treatments and top protocols in longevity to help our clients reach optimal health. Please [contact us](https://www.lifespanmedicine.com/contact) today to learn more about how we can help you reach all of your goals and live a long, happy and very healthy life.
